title: Buy Tickets Segment
custom_preconds: Given User has Ballpark app installed

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user has no favorite team selected
AND navigates to the Wallet Tab
And taps on the "Buy Tickets" Section
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN No Games please change your filter to view tickets will be displayed in the center of the screen.

Select A Team will be displayed on the top left button

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user selects a team from the Team Picker
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the selected team's schedule is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user has never visited the buy tickets Team picker
AND has at least one favorite team selected
AND navigates to the Wallet Tab
And taps on the "Buy Tickets" Section
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the number one ranked favorite team's schedule is displayed.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user has at least one favorite team associated with account
AND user has made a previous selection on the Buy Tickets team picker
AND navigates to the Wallet Tab
And taps on the "Buy Tickets" section
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the previously selected team's schedule will be displayed,  if different from the favorite team.

title: First View without Favorite Team
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app (10.1.0 or greater)
AND user is logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app
AND user does not have a favorite team established
AND user navigates to Tickets on bottom navigation
custom_expected: THEN no team is selected on the filter

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects the Buy tickets tab for the first time
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is shown No Games page
AND user is shown 'Select Team' button
AND user is shown 'Home Games' button

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps 'Select Team' button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the team picker will animate up over the view
AND all Teams will be displayed
AND the team names will be displayed as follows: Location name, Team Name (Check all 30 teams)
AND the team picker will display all team names in alphabetical order.
AND a Cancel/X button is displayed on the team picker

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps Cancel/X button with team picker
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN team picker is dismissed
AND user is returned back to No Games page

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user taps 'Select Team' button
AND user selects a team
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is returned back to Buy Tickets page with the selected team's schedule shown

title: View with Favorite Team
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app (10.1.0 or greater)
AND user is logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app
AND user has a favorite team established
AND user navigates to Tickets on bottom navigation

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the User taps the Buy Tickets tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the favorited team's events are returned
AND the Month Headers will be Sticky when scrolled
AND Display day of week and date # in the left column (this font size should be fixed and NOT change based on device settings)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user views each scheduled event presented
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN each event has Away team logo, away team name @ home team cap logo, home team name presented 
AND followed by Event time (always use local time) 
AND followed by Venue name (use venue string from data)

custom_steps_separated.content: [Remaining validation steps to be verified, ONLY if data is available]
custom_steps_separated.expected:
AND followed by Game description (example - 'Cubs home opener')
AND followed by Probable pitcher: Away probable pitcher name (away_name_abbrev) @ Home probable pitcher name (home_name_abbrev (example - 'Gibson, Kyle (PHI) @ Widener, Taylor (ARI)')

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the User taps the Buy Tickets button
And Events are returned
AND If probable data is not provided for one team
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the probable pitcher name will be replaced with "TBD"

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the User taps the Buy Tickets button
And Events are returned
AND If probable data is not provided for either team
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then do not show this pitcher row and "collapse" the space

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the User taps the Buy Tickets button
And Events are returned
And Promotions are available
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then a promotions link is displayed along with the number of available promotions

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the User taps the Buy Tickets button
And Events are returned
And Promotions are not available
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the Row for promotions is not displayed

title: No Search Results Returned [*Offseaon /Proxy]
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app (10.1.0 or greater)
AND user is logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app
AND user navigates to Tickets on bottom navigation

[During the season, a schedule is expected. During offseason, a schedule may also be shown for following season. May need to interrupt call via Proxy to validate view]
custom_steps: WHEN No Event shown in the Filter game
custom_expected: Then the page displays as No Game "Please change your filter"

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user taps on Buy Tickets 
AND selects a team that has no events
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the page displays No Games in the middle of the page

[IOS] AND text stating "Please change your filters"
OR
[ANDROID] AND text stating "Please change your filter to view tickets"

title: Buy Tickets - Team Filter
custom_preconds:
Given
The user has selected a team and is viewing the buy tickets tab
custom_expected: THEN user can switch the Team to any team to Buy Tickets

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is on the Buy Tickets Tab
AND taps with the team name
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the team picker slides up from the Bottom
AND all 30 MLB teams are displayed with their "cap" logo, sorted alphabetically.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects a team from the Team Picker
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the team picker is dismissed (including the team already selected)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is on the Buy Tickets Tab
AND taps with the team name
AND the user taps close from the Team Picker
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the team picker is dismissed
AND user is returned to the browse results previously displayed

title: Buy Tickets - Team Filter presents TeamPicker
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the user is logged in.
GIVEN that the user has no favorite team.
custom_expected: THEN the user closes the team picker without selecting a team they are taken back to the screen they where previously on

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User open the Ballpark app and Log In to the their account
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN User is looged in with their credentials

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user has no fave team
AND user is on Tickets > Buy Tickets tab
AND user taps 'Select team' filter
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN team picker is shown

custom_steps_separated.content: When User closes the Team Picker by clicking 'X'/'Cancel' without selecting any Team
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN User is taken to the previous page when trying to select the Team

title: Buy Tickets - Team Filter  shows Favorites Teams before remaining teams
custom_preconds: GIVEN User has a favorite team selected associated with the account
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to Tickets Tab Buy Tickets Segment
custom_expected:
Team filter screen will have the user's favorite team(s) pulled to the top of the list.
All other teams will display alphabetically

THEN List of teams, Logo, and Team Name

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user on the Buy Tickets segment within Tickets Tab
AND user selects the Team filter 
AND user selects a team
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Selected Team shows on the list

AND Team filter screen will have the user's favorite team(s) pulled to the top of the list.
AND All other teams will display alphabetically

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user tap the team selected, the filter will close and the list of game get refreshed and shows newly selected teams schedule
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN  Team is selected and filters are closed and list of the games get refreshed

title: Buy Tickets - Schedule Filter (Home / Full)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has downloaded BP app (11.3.0 or above)
AND user has logged in
custom_steps: WHEN user views the buy tickets tab
custom_expected: THEN user has ability to filter by team AND by schedule (Full Schedule / Home Games)

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN a user does not have a favorite team set NOR has the user visited the team page
WHEN the user navigates to Buy Tickets view within the Tickets tab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
[iOS]
THEN 'Select Team' is defaulted as the team filter
AND 'Home Games' is defaulted at the schedule filter
AND 'No Games' is shown on the page with 'Please change your filters'

[Android]
THEN 'SELECT A TEAM' is defaulted as the team filter
AND 'HOME GAMES' is defaulted at the schedule filter 
AND 'No Games' is shown on the page with 'Please change your filter to view tickets'

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps the 'Select Team'/'SELECT A TEAM' filter button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN a slide up menu will be displayed with all 30 teams listed with team logo, team location, and team name

[iOS]
AND 'Cancel' is shown at the top of the menu

[Android]
AND 'X' is shown at the top of the menu

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps 'Cancel'/'X' on the team selection menu
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is returned to Buy Tickets view without a team selected
AND 'No Games' page is shown

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps the 'Select Team'/'SELECT A TEAM' filter button
AND the user selects any team
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is returned to Buy Tickets view with the selected team show as the team filter button
AND the selected team schedule is shown with entries for each upcoming matchup particular to the schedule filter


[iOS/Android defaults to 'Home Games']
*list will only show games where the selected team is home for 'Home Games'

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps the schedule filter button ('Home Games' or 'Full Schedule')
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN a slide up menu will be displayed with Full Schedule and Home Games options

[iOS]
AND 'Cancel' is shown at the top of the menu

[Android]
AND 'X' is shown at the top of the menu

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps 'Cancel'/'X' on the schedule selection menu
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is returned to Buy Tickets view
AND the previously displayed game data is shown

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps the schedule filter button ('Home Games' or 'Full Schedule')
AND the user taps the prev selected schedule filter (noted with a checkmark)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is returned to Buy Tickets view
AND the previously displayed game data is shown

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps the schedule filter button ('Home Games' or 'Full Schedule')
AND the user taps the schedule filter NOT prev selected (noted without a checkmark)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is returned to Buy Tickets view
AND the game data particular to the schedule filter is shown

*list will only show games where the selected team is home for 'Home Games'
*list will show games where the selected team is home or away for 'Full Schedule'

custom_steps_separated.content:
*may need to perform a fresh install of the app

GIVEN a user does not have a favorite team set BUT the user has visited any team page (via Team Tab dropdown)
WHEN the user navigates to Buy Tickets view within the Tickets tab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
[iOS]
THEN the team selected from team page is defaulted as the team filter
AND 'Home Games' is defaulted at the schedule filter 


[Android]
THEN 'SELECT A TEAM' is defaulted as the team filter
AND 'HOME GAMES' is defaulted at the schedule filter 
AND 'No Games' page is shown

custom_steps_separated.content:
REPEAT STEPS 5 THROUGH 8

*Android will need to select a team before validation
custom_steps_separated.expected: VERIFY EXPECTATION OF EACH STEP

custom_steps_separated.content:

WHEN the user navigates to Buy Tickets view within the Tickets tab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the first favorited team is defaulted as the team filter

[iOS/Android]
AND 'Home Games'/'HOME GAMES' is defaulted at the schedule filter

custom_steps_separated.content: REPEAT STEPS 5 THROUGH 8
custom_steps_separated.expected: VERIFY EXPECTATION OF EACH STEP

custom_steps_separated.content:
*may need to perform a fresh install of the app

GIVEN a user has a favorite team set AND the user has visited a different team page from the favorite team (prior to navigating to Buy Tickets view)*
WHEN the user navigates to Buy Tickets view within the Tickets tab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
[iOS]
THEN the team selected from team page is defaulted as the team filter
AND 'Home Games' is defaulted at the schedule filter 

[Android]
THEN the first favorited team is defaulted as the team filter
AND 'HOME GAMES' is defaulted at the schedule filter

custom_steps_separated.content: REPEAT STEPS 5 THROUGH 8
custom_steps_separated.expected: VERIFY EXPECTATION OF EACH STEP
